data.title: Damien Drayer Obituary - ERIE, Pennsylvania
data.meta_description: Damien Drayer age 38 of Erie, passed away unexpectedly of natural causes at his home on Monday November 3, 2014.  He is survived by his mother Jean Dixon, father Jerry Roberts and Step-mother Lori Roberts.  Three brothers, Scott Drayer, Jerry Roberts Jr. and Jeremy Eller; two sisters, Tonya Baughman and Danae Roberts, and his loving commonwealth wife of five years Alexis Ott .  Left to cherish his memory are his children Khyre Drayer, Khyaira Drayer. Kaliyah Drayer, Damiana Drayer and Dyjmone Drayer, five nieces, two nephews and one greatâ€“niece. Damien was an avid coach for little league football (New Era) and had a great love for his family and friends.  Damien will be forever missed and will never be forgotten.  May the lord wrap his glorious and merciful arms around his son and cherish him forever.   Friends may call at the Russell C. Schmidt & Son Funeral Home Inc.  5000 Wattsburg Rd. Erie, 16504, on Friday from 2 to 4 and 6 to 8 PM.  Funeral Services will be held on Saturday morning at 11:00 AM at the First Born Apostolic Church of God 1221 East 19th St, interment will follow in Lakeside Cemetery.
